post:
Mentioned on WHT a few days ago, but I figured I should just let the community here know:

Just to let everyone know I have decided to change the minimum bid amount for 96MB.com for free as of this morning (EST this morning), so if you are an VPS provider and would like to place an advertisement on 96MB.com, feel free to go ahead and place your bids now:

https://www.projectwonderful.com/advertisehere.php?id=57905&type=4

I know I have been pretty behind all the review requests for the past few months, so this is my way of saying thank you to all the VPS providers who have submitted a review request to me and have been waiting patiently ever since. Thanks a lot, without you guys, 96MB.com won't be at the stage of where it is.

Have fun bidding!
